org.sindice.siren.index.codecs.siren10

Class Siren10BlockStreamFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sindice.siren.index.codecs.siren10.Siren10BlockStreamFactory

  • public class Siren10BlockStreamFactory
extends Object
    This class creates BlockIndexOutput and BlockIndexInput for the SIREn 1.0 postings format.
